cboCostEstimates.description: As passed by the House of Representatives on November 2, 2021
cboCostEstimates.title: H.R. 4515, Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2021

constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 126 (Monday, July 19, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Mr. GARBARINO:
H.R. 4515.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
The Congress enacts this bill pursuant to Clause 1 of
Section 8 of Article I of the United States Constitution,
which provides Congress with the ability to enact legislation
to provide for the general welfare of the United States.
[Page H3669]

latestAction.text: Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Small Business and Entrepreneurship.

title: Small Business Development Center Cyber Training Act of 2021
